CutSceneText.Text: Cross the bridge at the gate to Hanarkand.
At the prison entrance, disguise yourself as a Balaur using their equipment.
Once disguised, you'll be able to trick the Balaur guard away from the prison.
You'll have to finish the task quickly.
Otherwise, he might notice your disguise.
Inside, look for an imprisoned Reian tribeswoman named Donikia.
